00020 #ifndef INVERT_MATRIX_HPP
00021 #define INVERT_MATRIX_HPP

00023 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/lu.hpp>
00025 
00026 #include "logging.hpp"

00028 /* Matrix inversion routine.
00029    Uses lu_factorize and lu_substitute in uBLAS to invert a matrix */
00030 namespace ublas_util {  
00031   template<class T>
00032   bool InvertMatrix(const boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<T>& input, 
00033                     boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<T>& inverse) {
00034     using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00035     typedef permutation_matrix<std::size_t> pmatrix;
00036     try {
00037       // create a working copy of the input
00038       matrix<T> A(input);
00039       // create a permutation matrix for the LU-factorization
00040       pmatrix pm(A.size1());
00041       // perform LU-factorization
00042       if (0 != lu_factorize(A, pm))
00043         return false;
00044       // create identity matrix of "inverse"
00045       inverse.resize(A.size1(), A.size1());
00046       inverse.assign(identity_matrix<T>(A.size1()));
00047       // backsubstitute to get the inverse
00048       lu_substitute(A, pm, inverse);
00049     } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00050       LOG_ERROR(e.what());
00051       return false;
00052     } catch (...) {
00053       LOG_ERROR("InvertMatrix: unexpected exception raised");
00054       return false;
00055     }
00056     return true;
00057   }
00058 }
00059 #endif //INVERT_MATRIX_HPP
